search.query: | inputlookup mso_site_details | dedup apic_host | table apic_host | eval apic_host="apic_host!=".apic_host | mvcombine apic_host | eval apic_host=mvjoin(apic_host, " AND ")
| inputlookup mso_site_details | dedup mso_host | table mso_host

condition.set: eventtype="cisco_apic_*" component=credentials | fields apic_host | dedup apic_host | SORT apic_host

search.query: | inputlookup mso_site_details | search mso_host=$mso_host$ | dedup apic_host | table apic_host | eval apic_host="apic_host=".apic_host | mvcombine apic_host | eval apic_host=mvjoin(apic_host, " OR ")
| inputlookup mso_site_details | dedup mso_host | table mso_host

condition.set: eventtype="cisco_apic_*" component=credentials $not_search_apic_host$ | fields apic_host | dedup apic_host | SORT apic_host
| inputlookup mso_site_details | search mso_host=$mso_host$ | dedup apic_host | table apic_host

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:apic:class" $formed_apic_host$ |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)" | dedup Pod| table Pod

sourcetype="cisco:apic:class" $formed_apic_host$ |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)"| search Pod=$pod$| dedup APIC, apic_host | table APIC, apic_host |join APIC, apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC, apic_host | table APIC, apic_host, oobMgmtAddr]| dedup oobMgmtAddr| table oobMgmtAddr

html.div: APIC user role required: Read-All. For CPU, Memory and Fault statistics, 'admin' role privilege is required for the configured APIC user account.

search.query: sourcetype=cisco:apic:stats $formed_apic_host$ component=procCPU5min OR procCPU15min |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)\/sys\/proc\/proc-(?<Process>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC,apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host | search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] | xyseries repIntvEnd Process currentAvg

sourcetype=cisco:apic:stats $formed_apic_host$ component=procMem5min OR component=procMem15min |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)\/sys\/proc\/proc-(?<Process>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC,apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host| search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host]| eval currentAvg=round(currentAvg/(1024*1024),4) | xyseries repIntvEnd Process currentAvg

sourcetype=cisco:apic:stats $formed_apic_host$ component=procCPU5min OR procCPU15min |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)\/sys\/proc\/proc-(?<Process>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC,apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host| search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host ] | search Process=$process$ | table apic_host, currentAvg, currentMax, currentMin, repIntvStart, repIntvEnd | rename apic_host As "APIC Site/Cluster", currentAvg AS "Average CPU Utilization", currentMax AS "Max CPU Utilization", currentMin AS "Min CPU Utilization", repIntvStart AS "Interval Start", repIntvEnd AS "Interval End"

sourcetype=cisco:apic:stats $formed_apic_host$ component=procMem5min OR component=procMem15min |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)\/sys\/proc\/proc-(?<Process>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$ Process=$memory$| join APIC,apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host| search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host]| eval currentAvg=round(currentAvg/(1024*1024),4)| eval currentMax=round(currentMax/(1024*1024),4)| eval currentMin=round(currentMin/(1024*1024),4)| table apic_host, currentAvg, currentMax, currentMin, repIntvStart, repIntvEnd | rename apic_host As "APIC Site/Cluster", currentAvg AS "Average Memory Allocated", currentMax AS "Max Memory Allocated", currentMin AS "Min Memory Allocated", repIntvStart AS "Interval Start", repIntvEnd AS "Interval End"

sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=faultInst|rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC,apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host| search oobMgmtAddr="$node$" | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] | dedup dn,apic_host | stats count(dn) by severity

sourcetype="cisco:apic:class" $formed_apic_host$ component=eqptStorage |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)" | search Pod=$pod$ | join APIC type=left [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] |search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ |chart avg(capUtilized) AS "% Utilized" by modTs,mount useother=false

sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=faultInst severity=$severity$|rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC, apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host | search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] | stats latest(ack) as Acknowledged latest(APIC) AS Node latest(severity) AS Severity latest(cause) AS Cause latest(descr) AS Descr latest(rule) AS Rule latest(type) AS Type latest(created) AS Created latest(code) AS code latest(changeSet) AS ChangeSet by dn,apic_host |join type=left code [|inputlookup APICFaultDetails.csv]| table apic_host,dn, Acknowledged, Node, Severity, Cause, description, "Recommended Action", Descr, Rule, Type, Created, code, ChangeSet | rename apic_host AS "APIC Site/Cluster", code AS Code, description AS "Explanation", dn AS FQDN

sourcetype="cisco:apic:class" $formed_apic_host$ component=eqptStorage |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)" | search Pod=$pod$ | join APIC, apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host | search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] | search mount="$mnt$" | stats avg(capUtilized) by apic_host, fileSystem, blocks, operSt| rename apic_host AS "APIC Site/Cluster", fileSystem AS "File System", avg(capUtilized) AS " Avg. Disk Storage Utilization (%)", blocks AS "Blocks", operSt AS "Operational State"

sourcetype=cisco:apic:health $formed_apic_host$ component=eqptPsu| rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)\/sys\/ch\/psu(?<psu>[^\/]+)\/psu"| search Pod=$pod$ | join APIC,apic_host type=left [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host | table APIC,oobMgmtAddr,apic_host] |search oobMgmtAddr=$node$ | stats latest(volt) AS "Voltage" latest(drawnCurr) AS "Drawn Current" latest(operSt) AS "Operational State" latest(ser) AS "Serial No." by apic_host, psu, Pod, APIC | rename psu AS "Slot", apic_host As "APIC Site/Cluster"

sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ dn="*/node-*/*" component=procContainer |rex field=dn "topology\/(?<Pod>[^\/]+)\/(?<APIC>[^\/]+)"|search Pod=$pod$| join APIC, apic_host [search sourcetype=cisco:apic:class $formed_apic_host$ component=topSystem role=controller | eval APIC= "node-"+id |dedup APIC,apic_host,oobMgmtAddr]| search oobMgmtAddr="$node$" | stats latest(id) AS "Container Id" latest(adminSt) AS "Admin State" latest(processId) AS "Process Id" latest(cpuPct) AS "CPU Usage" latest(memPct) AS "Memory Allocated" latest(modTs) AS "Last Updated" by apic_host, containerName | rename containerName AS "Container Name", apic_host AS "APIC Site/Cluster"
